name: Neon Genesis Evangelion "Not For Sale" - 1997 GAINAX/EVA Vintage Poster
description:
This is an official 1997 Neon Genesis Evangelion B2 poster. 
This was used as decoration in a store and it was a promo product "Not For Sale". The small marks on the corner and middle of the poster are due the sticker tape used to exhibit it. No rips or heavy flaws. 
This is a completely grail for those who like Evangelion Posters.

Probably the first vintage poster being sold as an NFT. This piece includes the real physical poster.
